content:
Create personalized service experiences and reduce agent handling time with AI-generated email responses, grounded in your knowledge base. When agents select a recommended article on a case, Einstein analyzes it and then drafts an email response based on the article.

Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Service add-on

Service Replies for Email generates an email response based on knowledge articles relevant to your case. Simply draft, edit, and send emails from the Case page in the Lightning Service Console.

Service Replies charges only for the activity you use. Learn how your agents interact with Einstein generative AI and track your usage against your subscription allowance.
title: Einstein Service Replies for Email
